blocks.content:
## **Hey There, I'm Matthew!**

I'm the current Director of Finance, Interim Director of Academics, previous Vice President, and previous First Year Representative of the Carleton Computer Science Society. For the past three years, I've worked with the board to organize dozens of initiaves and I'd like to continue again next year as your **Director of Academics**.

## My Platform

If elected, I will organize a variety of iniatives that improve resource accessibility, create opportunities, and help our members achieve academic success.

 1. [**More Discrete Math Resources ✏️**](http://localhost:8002/blog/discrete-math-resources)
 2. [**More Industry Presentations and Info Sessions 💡**](http://localhost:8003/blog/info-sessions)
 3. [**More Tech Talk Variety  🎉**](http://localhost:8002/blog/tech-talks)
 4. [**A Brand New Website  💻**](http://localhost:8002/blog/website)
 5. [**Internship & Scholarship Resources  💼**](http://localhost:8002/blog/more-online-resources---internships-scholarships)
 6. [**Carleton CS News & Events Feed 📡**](http://localhost:8002/blog/carleton-cs-news-feed)
 7. [**Mentorship for Side Projects 🎓**](http://localhost:8003/blog/mentorship-for-side-projects)
 8. [**Student Open Source Development ⚒️**](http://localhost:8002/blog/open-source-initiative)
 9. [**More Daily Code Challenges 🗓️**](https://ccss.matthewmacraebovell.com/blog/more-daily-code-challenges)
10. [**Continuing Dev Club 🛠️**](http://localhost:8002/blog/dev-club)
